Every CPU requires a cooling system to keep it from overheating due to the workload placed upon it. However, most CPUs come with a stock cooler provided by the manufacturer that is adequate for normal performance. However, many users opt to purchase aftermarket cooling systems that are significantly better in keeping your CPU cool. This allow for overclocking which essentially pushes your CPU past its stock speed. By overclocking, users gain a faster CPU for little to no cost.
If you plan on overclocking your computer, we suggest selecting a CPU cooler.
